job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Ready to revolutionize education through cutting-edge AI technology? We're seeking a visionary Full-Stack Engineer to join our mission of transforming learning experiences. Dive into our suite of groundbreaking products:
     * TeachTap - Where history comes alive through AI-powered, TikTok-style learning
     * TeachTales - Creating magical, personalized storytelling adventures
     *
          + TimeBack - Your students' AI learning companion
     * Athena - Revolutionizing academic outcomes through AI-powered video content

   Imagine working in an environment where AI handles the mundane, leaving you free to tackle the exciting challenges that truly matter. Join a global team of innovators who are reshaping education through technology.

   What you will be doing

   Your journey with us will be filled with exciting challenges:
     * Craft elegant, modern web applications using cutting-edge technologies and frameworks
     *
          + ️ Pioneer new frontiers in cloud computing with advanced AWS serverless architectures
     * Shape our engineering culture through thoughtful code reviews and best practice implementation

   What you will NOT be doing

   We value your time and expertise. You won't be:
     * Wasting time on legacy system maintenance or trivial bug fixes
     * Wrestling with problematic infrastructure or poorly optimized systems
     * Trapped in endless planning meetings or organizational bottlenecks
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Developer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Ready to revolutionize education through cutting-edge AI technology? We're seeking a visionary Full-Stack Engineer to join our mission of transforming learning experiences. Dive into our suite of groundbreaking products:
     * TeachTap - Where history comes alive through AI-powered, TikTok-style learning
     * TeachTales - Creating magical, personalized storytelling adventures
     *
          + TimeBack - Your students' AI learning companion
     * Athena - Revolutionizing academic outcomes through AI-powered video content

   Imagine working in an environment where AI handles the mundane, leaving you free to tackle the exciting challenges that truly matter. Join a global team of innovators who are reshaping education through technology.

   What you will be doing

   Your journey with us will be filled with exciting challenges:
     * Craft elegant, modern web applications using cutting-edge technologies and frameworks
     *
          + ️ Pioneer new frontiers in cloud computing with advanced AWS serverless architectures
     * Shape our engineering culture through thoughtful code reviews and best practice implementation

   What you will NOT be doing

   We value your time and expertise. You won't be:
     * Wasting time on legacy system maintenance or trivial bug fixes
     * Wrestling with problematic infrastructure or poorly optimized systems
     * Trapped in endless planning meetings or organizational bottlenecks

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on building web applications and leveraging AI technologies within those applications, but it does not specify deep involvement in core AI model development, training, or fine-tuning. The emphasis is on the application layer and utilizing AI tools rather than creating or significantly modifying AI models themselves. Therefore, it aligns best with the 'Ambiguous' profile as it's primarily a software engineering role with AI integration, not a core AI/ML engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Craft elegant, modern web applications using cutting-edge technologies and frameworks' directly relates to building and maintaining software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Craft elegant, modern web applications using cutting-edge technologies and frameworks

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Pioneer new frontiers in cloud computing with advanced AWS serverless architectures' indicates work related to cloud infrastructure and deployment, which falls under operations engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Pioneer new frontiers in cloud computing with advanced AWS serverless architectures

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Shape our engineering culture through thoughtful code reviews and best practice implementation' relates to software development practices and team collaboration within an engineering context.
job_tasks.phrase: Shape our engineering culture through thoughtful code reviews and best practice implementation
